thumb.title: [OneShot "Happily Ever After" Remix] Until the Light is Found Again
thumb.description: 今度の関西けもケットに無事にサークル参加が決まりました(≧▽≦)今回はOneShotのアレンジCDという事で、10曲ほど曲を用意しました。今日はそのうちの1曲を公開します。視聴動画なども近々公開予定です。Our circle participation in the upcoming Kansai Kemoket has been successfully confirmed (≧▽≦)This time, it's a OneShot arrangement CD, so we've prepared about 10 songs.Today, we'll be releasing one of those songs. I'll also be releasing a viewing video soon.サイト↓https://oecusoundserver.github.io/Cadence/event/CAD-0009.html無断転載禁止/Unauthorized Reproduction ProhibitedTitle：Until the Light is Found Againremixed by クロカビillust：さくらもちOriginal：OneShot "Happily Ever After"Twitter：クロカビ( https://twitter.com/klokirb )Discord：https://discord.gg/n3zNdZF4mXマイリス：mylist/69998986
